00053 class FormWidget( QWidget, FormWidgetUi ):
00054         # form constructor:
00055         # model -> Name of the model the form should handle
00056         # res_id -> List of ids of type 'model' to load
00057         # domain -> Domain the models should be in
00058         # view_type -> type of view: form, tree, graph, calendar, ...
00059         # view_ids -> Id's of the views 'ir.ui.view' to show
00060         # context -> Context for the current data set
00061         # parent -> Parent widget of the form
00062         # name -> User visible title of the form
00063         def __init__(self, model, res_id=False, domain=[], view_type=None, view_ids=[], context={}, parent=None, name=False):
00064                 QWidget.__init__(self,parent)
00065                 FormWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00066                 self.setupUi( self )
00067 
00068                 if not view_type:
00069                         view_type = ['form','tree']
00070                 else:
00071                         if view_type[0] in ['graph'] and not res_id:
00072                                 res_id = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', model, 'search', domain)
00073                 fields = {}
00074                 self.model = model
00075                 self.previousAction = None
00076                 self.fields = fields
00077                 self.domain = domain
00078                 self.context = context
00079                 self.viewTypes = view_type
00080                 self.viewIds = view_ids
00081 
00082                 self._switchViewMenu = QMenu( self )
00083                 self._viewActionGroup = QActionGroup( self )
00084                 self._viewActionGroup.setExclusive( True )
00085                 for view in self.viewTypes:
00086                         action = ViewFactory.viewAction( view, self )
00087                         self.connect( action, SIGNAL('triggered()'), self.switchView )
00088                         self._switchViewMenu.addAction( action )
00089                         self._viewActionGroup.addAction( action )
00090 
00091                 self.group = RecordGroup( self.model, context=self.context )
00092                 self.group.setDomain( domain )
00093 
00094                 self.screen.setRecordGroup( self.group )
00095                 self.screen.setEmbedded( False )
00096                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('activated()'), self.switchView )
00097                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('currentChanged()'), self.updateStatus )
00098                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('closed()'), self.closeWidget )
00099                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('recordMessage(int,int,int)'), self.updateRecordStatus )
00100 
00101                 self._allowOpenInNewWindow = True
00102 
00103                 # Remove ids with False value
00104                 self.screen.setupViews( view_type, view_ids )
00105 
00106 
00107                 if name:
00108                         self.name = name
00109                 else:
00110                         self.name = self.screen.currentView().title
00111 
00112                 self.handlers = {
00113                         'New': self.new,
00114                         'Save': self.save,
00115                         'Export': self.export,
00116                         'Import': self.import_,
00117                         'Delete': self.remove,
00118                         'Find': self.search,
00119                         'Previous': self.previous,
00120                         'Next':  self.next,
00121                         'GoToResourceId':  self.goto,
00122                         'AccessLog':  self.showLogs,
00123                         'Reload': self.reload,
00124                         'Switch': self.switchView,
00125                         'Attach': self.showAttachments,
00126                         'Duplicate': self.duplicate,
00127                         'MassiveUpdate': self.massiveUpdate
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 if res_id:
00131                         if isinstance(res_id, int):
00132                                 res_id = [res_id]
00133                         self.screen.load(res_id)
00134                 else:
00135                         if len(view_type) and view_type[0]=='form':
00136                                 self.screen.new()
00137 
00138                 self.updateSwitchView()
00139 
00140                 self.reloadTimer = QTimer(self)
00141                 self.connect( self.reloadTimer, SIGNAL('timeout()'), self.autoReload )
00142                 self.pendingReload = False
00143 
00144                 # We always use the Subscriber as the class itself will handle
00145                 # whether the module exists on the server or not
00146                 self.subscriber = Rpc.Subscriber(Rpc.session, self)
00147                 if Options.options.get('auto_reload', False):
00148                         self.subscriber.subscribe( 'updated_model:%s' % model, self.autoReload )
00149 
00150         ## @brief Establishes that every value seconds a reload should be scheduled.
00151         # If value is < 0 only Subscription based reloads are executed. Note that if
00152         # value is != 0 Subscription based reloads are always used if available.
00153         def setAutoReload(self, value):
00154                 if value:
00155                         # We use both, timer and subscriber as in some cases information may change
00156                         # only virtually: Say change the color of a row depending on current time.
00157                         # If the value is negative we don't start the timer but keep subscription,
00158                         # so this allows setting -1 in autorefresh when you don't want timed updates
00159                         # but only when data is changed in the server.
00160                         if value > 0:
00161                                 self.reloadTimer.start( int(value) * 1000 )
00162                         if not Options.options.get('auto_reload', False):
00163                                 # Do not subscribe again if that was already done in the constructor
00164                                 self.subscriber.subscribe( 'updated_model:%s' % self.model, self.autoReload )
00165                 else:
00166                         self.reloadTimer.stop()
00167 
00168         def setAllowOpenInNewWindow( self, value ):
00169                 self._allowOpenInNewWindow = value
00170 
00171         def goto(self):
00172                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00173                         return
00174                 dialog = GoToIdDialog( self )
00175                 if dialog.exec_() == QDialog.Rejected:
00176                         return
00177                 self.screen.load( [dialog.result] )
00178                 
00179         def setStatusBarVisible(self, value):
00180                 self.uiStatusLabel.setVisible( value )
00181                 self.uiStatus.setVisible( value )
00182                 self.uiRecordStatus.setVisible( value )
00183                 
00184         def showAttachments(self):
00185                 id = self.screen.currentId()
00186                 if id:
00187                         if Options.options['attachments_dialog']:
00188                                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00189                                 window = AttachmentDialog(self.model, id, self)
00190                                 self.connect( window, SIGNAL('destroyed()'), self.attachmentsClosed )
00191                                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00192                                 window.show()
00193                         else:
00194                                 context = self.context.copy()
00195                                 context.update(Rpc.session.context)
00196                                 action = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'ir.attachment', 'action_get', context)
00197                                 action['domain'] = [('res_model', '=', self.model), ('res_id', '=', id)]
00198                                 context['default_res_model'] = self.model
00199                                 context['default_res_id'] = id
00200                                 Api.instance.executeAction( action, {}, context )
00201                 else:
00202                         self.updateStatus(_('No resource selected !'))
00203 
00204         def attachmentsClosed(self):
00205                 self.updateStatus()
00206 
00207         def switchView(self):
00208                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00209                         return
00210                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00211                 if ( self._allowOpenInNewWindow and QApplication.keyboardModifiers() & Qt.ShiftModifier ) == Qt.ShiftModifier:
00212                         Api.instance.createWindow(None, self.model, self.screen.currentId(), view_type='form', mode='form,tree')
00213                 else:
00214                         sender = self.sender()
00215                         name = unicode( sender.objectName()  )
00216                         if isinstance(sender, QAction) and name != 'actionSwitch':
00217                                 self.sender().setChecked( True )
00218                                 self.screen.switchView( name )
00219                         else:
00220                                 self.screen.switchView()
00221                 if self.pendingReload:
00222                         self.reload()
00223                 self.updateSwitchView()
00224                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00225 
00226         def showLogs(self):
00227                 id = self.screen.currentId()
00228                 if not id:
00229                         self.updateStatus(_('You have to select one resource!'))
00230                         return False
00231                 res = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', self.model, 'perm_read', [id])
00232                 message = ''
00233                 for line in res:
00234                         todo = [
00235                                 ('id', _('ID')),
00236                                 ('create_uid', _('Creation User')),
00237                                 ('create_date', _('Creation Date')),
00238                                 ('write_uid', _('Latest Modification by')),
00239                                 ('write_date', _('Latest Modification Date')),
00240                                 ('uid', _('Owner')),
00241                                 ('gid', _('Group Owner')),
00242                                 ('level', _('Access Level'))
00243                         ]
00244                         for (key,val) in todo:
00245                                 if line[key] and key in ('create_uid','write_uid','uid'):
00246                                         line[key] = line[key][1]
00247                                 message+=val+': '+str(line[key] or '/')+'\n'
00248                 QMessageBox.information(self, '', message)
00249 
00250         def remove(self):
00251                 value = QMessageBox.question(self,_('Question'),_('Are you sure you want to remove these records?'),QMessageBox.Yes|QMessageBox.No)
00252                 if value == QMessageBox.Yes:
00253                         QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00254                         if not self.screen.remove(unlink=True):
00255                                 self.updateStatus(_('Resource not removed !'))
00256                         else:
00257                                 self.updateStatus(_('Resource removed.'))
00258                         QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00259 
00260         def import_(self):
00261                 fields = []
00262                 dialog = ImportDialog(self.model, self.screen.fields, fields)
00263                 dialog.exec_()
00264 
00265         def export(self):
00266                 fields = []
00267                 dialog = ExportDialog(self.model, self.screen.allIds(), self.screen.fields, fields)
00268                 dialog.exec_()
00269 
00270         def new(self):
00271                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00272                         return
00273                 self.screen.new()
00274         
00275         def duplicate(self):
00276                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00277                         return
00278                 res_id = self.screen.currentId()
00279                 new_id = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', self.model, 'copy', res_id, {}, Rpc.session.context)
00280                 self.screen.load([new_id])
00281                 self.updateStatus(_('Working now on the duplicated document !'))
00282 
00283         def save(self):
00284                 if not self.screen.currentRecord():
00285                         return
00286                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00287                 modification = self.screen.currentRecord().id
00288                 id = self.screen.save()
00289                 if id:
00290                         self.updateStatus(_('Document saved !'))
00291                         if not modification:
00292                                 self.screen.new()
00293                 else:
00294                         self.updateStatus(_('Invalid form !'))
00295                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00296                 return bool(id)
00297 
00298         def previous(self):
00299                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00300                         return
00301                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00302                 self.screen.displayPrevious()
00303                 self.updateStatus()
00304                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00305 
00306         def next(self):
00307                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00308                         return
00309                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00310                 self.screen.displayNext()
00311                 self.updateStatus()
00312                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00313 
00314         def autoReload(self):
00315                 # Do not reload automatically if it's an editable list
00316                 # By explicitly disallowing this it makes the global 
00317                 # koo module auto_reload option to be usable.
00318                 if self.screen.currentView().showsMultipleRecords() and not self.screen.currentView().isReadOnly():
00319                         return
00320                 # Do not reload automatically if there are any modified records
00321                 # However, we take note that there's a pending reload which 
00322                 # will be done in the next switchView()
00323                 if self.screen.isModified():
00324                         self.pendingReload = True
00325                         return
00326                 self.reload()
00327                 # If current view only shows one record self.screen.reload() 
00328                 # only reloads the current record. As we want to be sure that
00329                 # any new records will appear in the list view (or any view that 
00330                 # shows multiple records), we set pendingReload to be run
00331                 # when switching view.
00332                 if not self.screen.currentView().showsMultipleRecords():
00333                         self.pendingReload = True
00334 
00335         def reload(self):
00336                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00337                 self.screen.reload()
00338                 self.updateStatus()
00339                 self.pendingReload = False
00340                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00341 
00342         def cancel(self):
00343                 QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00344                 self.screen.cancel()
00345                 self.updateStatus()
00346                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00347 
00348         def executeAction(self, keyword='client_action_multi', previous=False, report_type='pdf'):
00349                 ids = self.screen.allIds()
00350                 if self.screen.currentRecord():
00351                         id = self.screen.currentRecord().id
00352                 else:
00353                         id = False
00354                 if not self.screen.currentView().showsMultipleRecords():
00355                         id = self.screen.save()
00356                         if not id:
00357                                 return False
00358                         ids = [id]
00359                 if len(ids):
00360                         if previous and self.previousAction:
00361                                 Api.instance.executeAction(self.previousAction[1], {'model':self.screen.resource, 'id': id or False, 'ids':ids, 'report_type': report_type})
00362                         else:
00363                                 res = Api.instance.executeKeyword(keyword, {'model':self.screen.resource, 'id': id or False, 'ids':ids, 'report_type': report_type})
00364                                 if res:
00365                                         self.previousAction = res
00366                         self.reload()
00367                 else:
00368                         self.updateStatus(_('No record selected!'))
00369 
00370         def search(self):
00371                 if not self.modifiedSave():
00372                         return
00373                 dom = self.domain
00374                 dialog = SearchDialog(self.model, domain=self.domain, context=self.context, parent=self)
00375                 if dialog.exec_() == QDialog.Rejected:
00376                         return
00377                 self.screen.clear()
00378                 self.screen.load( dialog.result )
00379 
00380         def updateStatus(self, message=''):
00381                 if self.model and self.screen.currentRecord() and self.screen.currentRecord().id:
00382                         ids=Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'ir.attachment', 'search', [('res_model','=',self.model),('res_id','=',self.screen.currentRecord().id)])
00383                 else:
00384                         ids = []
00385                 message = ( _("(%s attachments) ") % len(ids) ) + message
00386                 self.uiStatus.setText( message )
00387 
00388         def updateSwitchView(self):
00389                 for action in self._viewActionGroup.actions():
00390                         if action.objectName() == self.screen.currentView().viewType():
00391                                 action.setChecked( True )
00392                                 break
00393 
00394         def updateRecordStatus(self, position, count, value):
00395                 if not count:
00396                         msg = _('No records')
00397                 else:
00398                         pos = '_'
00399                         if position >= 0:
00400                                 pos = str(position+1)
00401                         if value == None:
00402                                 # Value will be None only when it's called by the constructor
00403                                 edit = _('No document selected')
00404                         else:
00405                                 # Other times it'll either be 0 (new document) or the appropiate
00406                                 # object i
00407                                 edit = _('New document')
00408                                 if value > 0:
00409                                         edit = _('Editing document (id: %s)') % str(value)
00410                         msg = _('Record: %(name)s / %(count)s - %(name2)s') % { 'name': pos, 'count': str(count), 'name2': edit }
00411 
00412                 self.uiRecordStatus.setText( msg )
00413 
00414         def modifiedSave(self):
00415                 if self.screen.isModified():
00416                         value = QMessageBox.question( self, _('Question'), _('This record has been modified do you want to save it?'), QMessageBox.Save | QMessageBox.Discard | QMessageBox.Cancel )
00417                         if value == QMessageBox.Save:
00418                                 return self.save()
00419                         elif value == QMessageBox.Discard:
00420                                 self.cancel()
00421                                 return True
00422                         else:
00423                                 return False
00424                 else:
00425                         # If a new record was created but not modified, isModified() will return
00426                         # False but we want to cancel new records anyway.
00427                         # We call screen.cancel() directly as we don't want to trigger an updateStatus()
00428                         # which will result in a server request.
00429                         self.screen.cancel()
00430                 return True
00431 
00432         def massiveUpdate(self):
00433                 if not self.screen.selectedIds():
00434                         QMessageBox.information( self, _('No records selected'), _('No records selected') )
00435                         return
00436                 dialog = MassiveUpdateDialog( self )
00437                 dialog.setIds( self.screen.selectedIds() )
00438                 dialog.setModel( self.model )
00439                 dialog.setContext( self.context )
00440                 dialog.setup( self.viewTypes, self.viewIds )
00441                 dialog.exec_()
00442                 self.reload()
00443 
00444         def closeWidget(self):
00445                 self.screen.storeViewSettings()
00446                 self.reloadTimer.stop()
00447                 self.subscriber.unsubscribe()
00448                 self.emit( SIGNAL('closed()') )
00449 
00450         def canClose(self, urgent=False):
00451                 # Store settings of all opened views before closing the tab.
00452                 self.screen.storeViewSettings()
00453                 if self.modifiedSave():
00454                         # Here suppose that if we return True the form/tab will
00455                         # actually be closed, so stop reload timer so it doesn't
00456                         # remain active if the object is freed.
00457                         self.reloadTimer.stop()
00458                         self.subscriber.unsubscribe()
00459                         return True
00460                 else:
00461                         return False
00462 
00463         def actions(self):
00464                 return self.screen.actions
00465 
00466         def switchViewMenu(self):
00467                 return self._switchViewMenu
00468 
00469         def __del__(self):
00470                 print "DEL FORMWIDGET"
00471                 self.group.__del__()
00472                 del self.group
